loaderdefs.h File Reference

Defines data types and structures used by the DSP/BIOS(tm) Link loader. More...

#include <dsplink.h>
#include <procdefs.h>

Include dependency graph for loaderdefs.h:

Data Structures

struct  BINLOADER_ImageInfo_tag
struct  STATICLOADER_ImageInfo_tag
struct  NOLOADER_ImageInfo_tag
struct  COFFLOADER_ImageInfo_tag

COFFLOADER_ImageInfo

Structure defining information about the image to be loaded. A pointer to this structure is passed during the PROC_load () function as the imagePath, when the COFF loader to be read from memory is used.

============================================================================

Parameters:
fileAddr GPP kernel address from where the COFF file is to be read.
size Size of .out file.
See also:
PROC_load () ============================================================================


#define BinLoaderImageInfo   BINLOADER_ImageInfo
typedef COFFLOADER_ImageInfo_tag COFFLOADER_ImageInfo

BINLOADER_ImageInfo

Structure defining information about the image to be loaded. A pointer to this structure is passed during the PROC_load () function as the imagePath, when the binary loader is used.

============================================================================

Parameters:
gppAddr Address of the file to be loaded, in GPP address space.
dspLoadAddr DSP address where the binary file is to be loaded.
dspRunAddr DSP address from where the binary file execution is to be started.
fileSize Size of the file to be loaded in bytes.
shmBaseAddr Address of the symbol where the DSPLINK shared memory base address is stored.
See also:
PROC_load () ============================================================================


typedef BINLOADER_ImageInfo_tag BINLOADER_ImageInfo

STATICLOADER_ImageInfo

Structure defining information about the image to be loaded. A pointer to this structure is passed during the PROC_load () function as the imagePath, when the static loader is used.

============================================================================

Parameters:
dspRunAddr DSP address from where the binary file execution is to be started.
argsAddr Address of the .args section.
argsSize Size of the .args section.
shmBaseAddr Address of the symbol where the DSPLINK shared memory base address is stored.
See also:
PROC_load () ============================================================================


typedef STATICLOADER_ImageInfo_tag STATICLOADER_ImageInfo

NOLOADER_ImageInfo

Structure defining information about the image to be loaded. A pointer to this structure is passed during the PROC_load () function as the imagePath, when the dummy loader is used.

============================================================================

Parameters:
dspRunAddr DSP address from where the binary file execution is to be started.
argsAddr Address of the .args section.
argsSize Size of the .args section.
shmBaseAddr Address of the symbol where the DSPLINK shared memory base address is stored.
See also:
PROC_load () ============================================================================


typedef NOLOADER_ImageInfo_tag NOLOADER_ImageInfo

Defines

#define LOADERDEFS_H

Detailed Description

Defines data types and structures used by the DSP/BIOS(tm) Link loader.

============================================================================
